content.rendered:
The Irchester Picnic Table is made from treated Spruce Wood and a 55mm parasol hole in the middle of the table. Impregnated with a high quality wood preserver.

This item comes flat packed for easy assembly and has a 1 year guarantee.

This product benefits from:

– 40mm thick x 100mm wide timber spruce wood slats

– Extremely robust construction

– Smooth timber slats for ultimate comfort

– Environmentally friendly pressure treated timber

– Galvanised metal fixings

– Rounded corners and edges for added safety

– Parasol Hole and room for a parasol base

These items are best assembled upside-down.
